title: What script typeface is this?
content:
Hi there,

have problems identifying this font. Anyone who got a clue?  
Thanks in advance!

/morten
author: fatslice

comments.content: Looks like [Eclat](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103310/http:/www.fonts.com/font/image-club/eclat) by Doyald Young. Nick Curtis also did a revival under the name of [Creampuff](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103310/http:/www.abstractfonts.com/font/11654).
Thank you guys. Hard to tell them apart ...if there are any differences at all?!

According to Nick Curtis himself

> ...and redesigned in some instances (compare the lowercase r in the two fonts, for instance).

[http://typophile.com/node/18520](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016103310/http:/typophile.com/node/18520 "http://typophile.com/node/18520")
hmm ...think I'll give credit where credits due - by buyng Eclat. Thanks again:)
